compliant.section: ECS frames Privacy Policy(the "Policy") and outlines what personal information we may collect, how we use and safeguard the collected personal information and with whom we may share it .
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject.

compliant.section: Your accessing of our website at www . ecs . com . tw (the "Website") will be deemed that you accept this Policy . If you are a minor, you shall access or use the Website only after your parents(or your guardian) read and agree our Policy .

When you submit personal information and certain information from you when use or interact with our Website(hereinafter referred to as “Information”), it constitutes your consent to the use of such Information for the purpose(s)stated below .
compliant.legal provisions: Definitions of consent, Lawfulness of processing

non_compliant.section: To comply with Personal Information Protecting Act and applicable laws, ECS frames Privacy Policy(the "Policy") and outlines what personal information we may collect, how we use and safeguard the collected personal information and with whom we may share it .
non_compliant.legal provisions: The specific law cited "Personal Information Protecting Act" is not mentioned, it's recommended to specify the legislation, especially if it's not a European Union law.
non_compliant.amend: To comply with the Personal Information Protecting Act [Specific Act Name], [Country]'s implementation of the GDPR and other applicable laws, ECS frames this Privacy Policy (the "Policy") outlining what personal information we may collect, how we use and safeguard it, and with whom we may share it.

non_compliant.section: The use, access or submission of personal information to the Website by you, or if you are a minor, the submission of your personal information either by your parents (or your guardian) or by you with the permission of your parents (or guardian) to ECS will be deemed as your acceptance of this Policy .
non_compliant.amend: The use, access, or submission of personal information to the Website by you, or if you are a minor, by your parents (or guardian) on your behalf, constitutes consent to this Policy.  We will obtain verifiable parental consent for the processing of personal data of a child below the age determined by EU Member State law.

non_compliant.section: Information from your use of Website Device information: Such as your device model, serial number, the version and type of your operation system, IP address and other unique device identifiers .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: Information from your use of Website Device information: We collect minimized device information, such as your device model (only when necessary for service provision), and we avoid collecting serial numbers or other unique device identifiers unless strictly necessary and with a legal basis.

non_compliant.section: Log information: Such as the settings, activation time of your devices, the network you use to connect to our Website, the status of the network, standby status, crash history, preferred interface, type and language settings of browser, diagnose and usage data, cookies as well as your usage behavior on our Website .
non_compliant.amend: Log information: We collect log information, such as the network you use to connect to our Website, browser type and language settings, and publicly available IP address. This information is used for aggregated, anonymized statistical purposes and to ensure the security and functionality of our Website. We do not use this information to identify you or track your individual behavior.
